t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The Amazon logo is composed of a wordmark “Amazon” in the lowercase letters. Under the lettering there is a smooth and bold yellow arrow, coming from the letter “A” to “Z”, forming a smile. The first versions of this emblem contained the “.com” part, but it was removed after ...

t: Style labels with glyphs - Amazon Location Service
s: Glyphs are binary files containing encoded Unicode characters, which are used by a map renderer to display labels. Amazon Location Service enables the retrieval of specific glyphs from a font stack for use in map rendering through the GetGlyphs API.
